title: UI (2024) Box Office Collection Day 7 - Sacnilk
Legendary writer MT Vasudevan Nair cremated with state honours - Onmanorama
summary:
Legendary Writer MT Vasudevan Nair Cremated with State Honours

Published: December 26, 2024 07:11 AM IST | Source: Manorama News

Kerala mourns the loss of the legendary Malayalam writer, MT Vasudevan Nair, who was cremated with full state honours. His body was wrapped in red silk and taken to the crematorium, where a gun salute was given. Family members performed the last rites following the ceremony.

  • MT Vasudevan Nair passed away at the age of 91 at Kozhikode Baby Memorial Hospital.
  • He was hospitalized on December 15 due to severe breathing difficulties.
  • A large crowd gathered to pay their respects at the crematorium and his residence.
  • Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan and several celebrities attended the cremation.
  • Ministers and public figures spoke at a condolence meeting following the cremation.
“MT gave me some of the most memorable characters in my film career,” said actor Mohanlal.

The Kerala government declared Thursday and Friday as official days of mourning in honour of the writer, highlighting the profound impact of his contributions to literature.
newTitle: Legendary Writer MT Vasudevan Nair Cremated with State Honours

title: Was Offered CM Post, They Came Back With Deputy CM Post When I Said No: Sonu Sood - News18
summary:
Sonu Sood Rejects Political Offers, Remains Committed to Acting

Date: December 26, 2024 Source: News18

Bollywood star Sonu Sood, renowned for his humanitarian efforts during the 2020 COVID-19 lockdown, has declined several political offers including significant roles like Chief Minister and Deputy Chief Minister, reaffirming his commitment to acting.

  • Sood received multiple offers to enter politics, including Chief Minister and Deputy Chief Minister positions.
  • He stated that influential political figures approached him with these offers, emphasizing their surprise at his refusal.
  • Sood values his freedom to help people without political constraints and fears being accountable in a political role.
  • While acknowledging the benefits of political positions, Sood expressed he is not ready for that lifestyle.
  • Finally, he remains focused on his career in cinema, particularly with the upcoming release of his film Fateh.
“I was even offered the position of Chief Minister. When I turned it down, they suggested, ‘Why not Deputy Chief Minister?’”

Sood's steadfast decision highlights his dedication to personal values over political ambition.
newTitle: Sonu Sood Rejects Political Offers, Remains Committed to Acting

title: Pushpa 2 UK Box Office: Breaks 7-Year-Old Record Of Baahubali 2 To Become No.1 Tollywood Grosser! - Koimoi
summary:
Pushpa 2 UK Box Office: Breaks 7-Year-Old Record Of Baahubali 2 To Become No.1 Tollywood Grosser!

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2, after almost three weeks in theatres, has surpassed Baahubali 2's lifetime collection, becoming the highest-grossing Tollywood film in the UK.

  • After maintaining strong performance, Pushpa 2 has crossed Baahubali 2's record, a title held since 2017.
  • The film amassed £1.83 million in the UK in 21 days, just edging past Baahubali 2's £1.82 million.
  • The massive buzz around Pushpa 2 contributed to its success not just in India but also internationally.
  • The film's collection in Indian rupees stands at approximately 19.54 crores.
“It unleashed one remarkable feat at the UK box office by surpassing the lifetime collection of Baahubali 2.”

This milestone marks a significant achievement for Indian cinema, showcasing the growing popularity of Tollywood films in international markets.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 UK Box Office: Breaks 7-Year-Old Record Of Baahubali 2 To Become No.1 Tollywood Grosser!

title: Squid Game Season 2: Release Date And Time In India, Cast, What To Expect And All About K-drama Before Premiere - News24
summary:
Squid Game Season 2: Release Date And Time In India

Date Published: December 26, 2024 Source: News24

As the anticipation builds, 'Squid Game Season 2' is set to premiere on Netflix, continuing the thrilling story that captivated audiences worldwide.

Release Date And Time

'Squid Game Season 2' will release on Netflix on December 26 at 1:31 pm in India.

Total Episodes

This season will feature a total of seven episodes.

Cast

  • Lee Jung-jae
  • Lee Byung-hun
  • Wi Ha-jun
  • Gong Yoo
  • Yim Si-wan
  • Kang Ha-neul
  • Park Gyu-young
  • Park Sung-hoon
  • Jo Yu-ri
  • Yang Dong-geun
  • Kang Ae-sim
  • Lee David
  • Lee Jin-uk

The returning cast is joined by several new actors playing characters with their own motives.

About Season 3

Director Hwang Dong-hyuk confirmed that the series will include a third season, emphasizing the immense response from fans and the narrative’s evolution.

“Seong Gi-hun who vowed revenge at the end of Season 1 returns and joins the game again. Will he succeed in getting his revenge?”

Plot Overview

Season 2 picks up from the cliffhanger of Season 1, with Gi-hun set to dive back into the deadly game.

With its gripping narrative and rich character arcs, 'Squid Game Season 2' promises to be another rollercoaster of emotions.
newTitle: Squid Game Season 2: Release Date, Cast, and What to Expect

Barroz box office collection day 1: Mohanlal film gets dismal opening compared to Malaikottai Vaaliban - Hindustan Times
summary:
Barroz box office collection day 1: Mohanlal film gets dismal opening compared to Malaikottai Vaaliban

Date: December 26, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The Malayalam-language fantasy film Barroz was released in theatres on December 25, directed by and starring Mohanlal. Despite the hype and its unique 3D filming, the movie only managed to collect ₹3.65 crore net on its opening day, which is significantly lower than Mohanlal's previous release, Malaikottai Vaaliban.

  • Barroz collected ₹3.65 crore on its opening day.
  • Malaikottai Vaaliban had an opening day collection of ₹5.65 crore.
  • Mohanlal promoted the film extensively before release.
  • The film is based on Jijo Punnoose’s novel Barroz: Guardian of D'Gama's Treasure.
“I have done a couple of Hindi films also. But now, most of my other films are dubbed into Hindi. When somebody calls me for a role I'll definitely come and work.” - Mohanlal

The film has faced criticism for lacking depth even though Mohanlal's performance received praise. Its future box office performance is uncertain.
newTitle: Barroz Box Office Collection Day 1: Disappointing Opening for Mohanlal's Directorial Debut

title: Barroz Box Office Collection Day 1: Registers An Underwhelming Start, Earns 35% Less Than Mohanlal’s Last Release - Koimoi
summary:
Barroz Box Office Collection Day 1: Registers An Underwhelming Start, Earns 35% Less Than Mohanlal’s Last Movie

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Koimoi

Mohanlal’s much-talked-about Barroz was released in theatres yesterday and it accumulated a fair number on its day 1. It had the advantage of the Christmas holiday, but the film didn’t go full throttle through over-the-counter ticket sales.

  • The film earned 3.65 crore net at the Indian box office on day 1.
  • This was 35% less than Mohanlal’s previous release, Malaikottai Vaaliban, which earned 5.65 crore net.
  • Barroz faced competition from Marco, which earned 4.30 crore net.
  • The film had a morning occupancy of 49%.
  • Despite being praised for its visuals, the film received mixed reviews.
“It’s a fair number but much below expectations.”

The opening box office collection for Barroz has been disappointing given its budget of 80 crores and the expectations placed upon it.
newTitle: Barroz Box Office Collection Day 1: Registers An Underwhelming Start, Earns 35% Less Than Mohanlal’s Last Movie

title: Squid Game Season 2 Review: Very Close To A Worthy Continuation - NDTV Movies
summary:
Squid Game Season 2 Review: Very Close To A Worthy Continuation

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

It is finally here. The three-year wait has been well worth it. Season 2 of Squid Game packs quite a wallop, with lead actor Lee Jung-jae slipping into a steely, personal mission-mode avatar.

  • Season 2 consists of seven episodes, each around an hour long.
  • It does not replicate the intense moments of Season 1 but offers new opportunities for storytelling.
  • Explores themes of class disparities and personal struggles against a backdrop of survival games.
  • Features new characters and continues the journey of familiar ones, particularly Seong Gi-hun.
  • Ends with an open-ended finale that hints at a possible third season.
"The Game won't stop until the world changes." - A quote from the Front Man.

Season 2 comes very close to being a worthy continuation of the original series, maintaining the show’s critical themes while expanding the narrative.

title: ‘Sankranthi movies, ticket hikes, benefit shows are unimportant now’: Dil Raju after meeting Telangana CM Revanth Reddy - Hindustan Times
summary:
‘Sankranthi movies, ticket hikes, benefit shows are unimportant now’: Dil Raju after meeting Telangana CM Revanth Reddy

Publication Date: Dec 26, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

Representatives of the Telugu film industry met with Telangana CM Revanth Reddy to discuss the industry's growth and social responsibilities.

  • Dil Raju, the chairman of Telangana’s Film Development Corporation, emphasized the need for the film industry to grow and support social awareness.
  • The CM aims to make Hyderabad an international hub for film production.
  • Concerns about safety and public events were raised following the Pushpa 2 stampede incident.
  • No special screenings or ticket hikes will be allowed for films in Telangana moving forward.
  • Numerous top personalities from the film industry were present at the meeting.
“Today’s agenda was to discuss how to make Hyderabad an international movie hub... Stop asking about Sankranthi movies, they are unimportant.” - Dil Raju

The meeting highlighted the film industry's commitment to public safety and collaboration with the government for future developments.
newTitle: Telugu Film Industry's Future Discussed in Meeting with Telangana CM

title: Top Highest Grossing Films in APTS: Allu Arjun starrer Pushpa 2 second beating Baahubali 2 & Kalki 2898 AD - PINKVILLA
summary:
Top Highest Grossing Films in APTS: Allu Arjun starrer Pushpa 2 second beating Baahubali 2 & Kalki 2898 AD

Updated on: Dec 26, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

The Allu Arjun starrer has grossed Rs. 316 crore approx in the twin states, slotting it between two SS Rajamouli films — behind RRR and ahead of Baahubali 2. The film still has potential to increase its gross with the New Year holidays approaching.

  • Pushpa 2 is now the second highest-grossing film ever in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana.
  • The film grossed Rs. 316 crore, behind only RRR with Rs. 396 crore.
  • It has sold over 1.60 crore tickets in Telugu states.
  • There are claims that the film has not performed well, attributed to high ticket prices.
  • The film is projected to reach close to Rs. 350 crore by the end of its run.
“Despite extraordinary business in Ceded, the profits will only be 20 percent or so, while Nizam will just about break even.”

Pushpa 2's success highlights its popularity despite challenges, reinforcing its position as a major player in the Telugu film industry.
newTitle: Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2 Becomes Second Highest Grossing Film in AP/TS

title: Top Highest Grossing Films in APTS: Allu Arjun starrer Pushpa 2 second beating Baahubali 2 & Kalki - PINKVILLA
summary:
Pushpa 2 Becomes Second Highest Grossing Film in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana

Published on: Dec 26, 2024  |  Source: Pinkvilla

The Allu Arjun-starrer Pushpa 2 has grossed approximately Rs. 316 crore, making it the second highest-grossing film ever in the Telugu states, just behind RRR.

  • Pushpa 2 grossed Rs. 316 crore in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana.
  • The film ranks behind RRR and ahead of Baahubali 2 in box office performance.
  • It is increasing its gross with New Year holidays approaching, likely nearing Rs. 350 crore.
  • In Ceded districts, it became the second film to cross Rs. 50 crore.
  • Despite high gross, distributor recovery narratives suggest underperformance.
  • By the end of its run, Pushpa 2 will have sold over 1.60 crore tickets, second only to RRR.
"Despite extraordinary business in Ceded, the profits will only be 20 percent or so, while Nizam will just about breakeven."

In summary, Pushpa 2's success is notable, both in gross earnings and ticket sales, but current narratives regarding its performance may not align with its box office numbers.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Becomes Second Highest Grossing Film in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana
